title: How to Make Hazelnut and Split Pea Vegan Roast

steps.headline: Preheat the oven and set the temperature at 190ºC (375ºF).
Cook the split peas, stock cube, bay leave and thyme in boiling water for 40 - 50 minutes.
Fry the onion, garlic and mushrooms in oil while this is cooking.
Add the cooked split peas to the cooled fried mixture and mix.
steps.description: Then add the remaining ingredients while stirring together.

steps.headline: Place the mixture into an ovenproof dish and cover with foil to prevent browning.
Serve hot with a favourite savoury sauce.

text: Preheat the oven and set the temperature at 190ºC (375ºF).  Cook the split peas, stock cube, bay leave and thyme in boiling water for 40 - 50 minutes.  Fry the onion, garlic and mushrooms in oil while this is cooking.  Add the cooked split peas to the cooled fried mixture and mix. Then add the remaining ingredients while stirring together. Place the mixture into an ovenproof dish and cover with foil to prevent browning.  Bake for 45 minutes.  Serve hot with a favourite savoury sauce.
